snippet.title: Morph Girl Trailer
snippet.description:
Morph Girl is a Japanese horror inspired FMV coming to PC.

Elana Pierce is a grieving widow that cannot seem to move on following the death of her wife, Rebecca. When a mysterious, supernatural being begins to force itself into her daily life –life playing upon the memories of the dearly departed – she must make the decision to embrace or reject the creature. 

Will she reject its invitation? Or embrace it? 

Coming to Steam and Itch.io on August 30th!

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/688260/Morph_Girl/
Itch.io: https://jaydeb.itch.io/morph-girl
